hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #an Ocarina#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: You thought it would be a useful hint, but it was me, Junk Hint!

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Deku Tree#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #2# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fishing Rod#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #bottom of Zora's Fountain# lies #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Fishing Rod#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Main Area Right Slingshot Wonderitem 2

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest
